group_1.textRight: [se:8000_flame_01_s][chara:102102:effect_7000_attack01]BURN!

group_1.textLeft: Hmph... You take far too long to spray that fire.

group_1.textRight: Tch!
Seriously, where the fuck's all that stamina comin' from...?

group_1.textLeft: It's been so long since then.
This is the place where Senpai became a Witch.

group_1.narration: "It's alright... @Our last six months together weren't in vain... @And now I'll live on within you..."
"Just remember... Whenever you need help, @I'll be right there with you... Alright...?"
"Yuna... Please be safe... @My death will probably stain Futatsugi City red..."

group_1.textLeft: Just as she said, my life as a Magical Girl was stained @a deep red.
And I can no longer carry on
the legacy of kindness that she passed down to me...

group_1.textRight: [chara:102102:effect_7001_attack02][se:8000_flame_01_s]Shut the hell up already!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102400:effect_7000_attack01][surround:0001_jump01]Seyah!
It all began after I got you to start working @under me...
For someone who had been running roughshod, @I must say I'm rather underwhelmed.

group_1.textRight: Shut up, you wannabe leader... @Who the hell do you think you are?
Juri the Great's been leadin' these girls for half a @year! You think you can just start bossin' us around?

group_1.textLeft: You've only been leading them with brute force and fear.
Now that Senpai is gone, I'm the one who will carry @on her legacy and give these girls some sense of @stability.

group_1.textRight: And you're usin' brute force to get me to fall in line. @How ironic is that?

group_1.textLeft: You wouldn't listen to me otherwise, would you?

group_1.textRight: ...Heehee... [chara:102400:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102400:cheek_0][chara:102400:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102400:lipSynch_1]More or less. Alright, fine. @Have it your way.
But you're gonna regret lettin' me live.
The longer I wait, the hotter my flames burn...
When I finally get another chance to fight you,
you'll be torched well-done by Juri the Great's @inferno.

group_1.textLeft: After that, we all started hunting down Kyubey throughout the city.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102400:effect_7002_damage01][surround:1005A01][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Ugh...
Heh, that takes me back,
[se:8000_flame_01_s][chara:102102:effect_7001_attack02]don't it!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102102:effect_7003_damage02][se:8001_flame_01_v][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Nh!

group_1.textRight: But the more Kyubey we killed, the less Witches we could find around the city.
Makes sense. Fewer Kyubey means fewer Magical @Girls, and fewer Magical Girls means fewer Witches.

group_1.textLeft: [surround:0001_jump01][chara:102400:effect_7001_attack02]And then you disappeared from my gang!

group_1.textRight: [se:8000_flame_01_s][chara:102102:effect_7000_attack01]That's because I didn't wanna just play nice and die @of hunger together!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102102:effect_7002_damage01][se:8001_flame_01_v][bgEffect:shakeSmall]AAAAAH!

group_1.textRight: Hahaha, it's hot, ain't it...? @I want ya to burn even more!

group_1.textLeft: ...And when Witches disappeared from the city...!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's when the [textRed:Bloody Tragedy] began.
And today's the day it ends!
Are you for real?!

group_1.textLeft: Do you know what caused the [textRed:Bloody Tragedy]?

group_1.textRight: [se:8000_flame_01_s][chara:102102:effect_7000_attack01]The Witches vanishin'.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102102:effect_7002_damage01][se:8000_flame_01_s][bgEffect:shakeSmall]...
Correct. Then, why did they vanish?

group_1.textRight: [se:8000_flame_01_s][chara:102102:effect_7001_attack02]That's somethin' even you don't know!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102102:effect_7003_damage02][se:8001_flame_01_v][bgEffect:shakeSmall]...

group_1.textRight: How the fuck are you still standin'...? How are you walkin' like my flames are nothin' to you...?!

group_1.textLeft: Because I have to take my revenge on Kamihama!
*Pant*...*Pant*...

group_1.textRight: Kamihama...?

group_1.textLeft: They were the ones who took our Witches away...
They were the ones who forced us to fight and @take the lives of our friends.
It's all their fault!

group_1.textRight: Now I getcha... It's them you wanna kill, huh...

group_1.textLeft: So, Juri, you will become mine...
And help me with my revenge...

group_1.textRight: Tsk...
You're gonna turn yourself into a Witch with all @that hate you have towards them...!
Before that happens... I'll burn ya to death!
With this blazing inferno I promised you a year ago!
